The base class of a monospaced typeface which uses a single standard width for the glyphs.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

bezierThreshold : Float

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
The threshold for drawing bézier curves. The resolution (aka the smoothness of the curve) increases as the threshold goes to zero. When the threshold is zero or negative, the curve is approximated by just two segments.

free(default,method) : Void -> Void

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
Nullifies references so all used resources can be garbage collected.

getBounds(default,method) : s : String -> x : Float -> y : Float -> centered : Bool -> tight : Bool -> output : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2

getBounds(default,method) : text : String -> x : Float -> y : Float -> centered : Bool -> tight : Bool -> output : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
Computes a single axis-aligned bounding box spanning all characters specified in text, where x, y defines the position of the first character. x is measured relative to the left edge of the character, while y is the position of the character's baseline.

getIndividualBounds(default,method) : text : String -> x : Float -> y : Float -> centered : Bool -> tight : Bool -> Array<de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2>

getIndividualBounds(default,method) : text : String -> x : Float -> y : Float -> centered : Bool -> tight : Bool -> Array<de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2>

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
Computes an axis-aligned bounding box for each character specified in text, where x, y defines the position of the first character.

setRenderer(default,method) : vr : de.polygonal.gl.VectorRenderer -> Void

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
Assigns a renderer that handles all drawing commands.

size(_gsize,_ssize) : Float

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
Defines the font size. A value of 100 equals 72pt or one inch.

tabSize : Int

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
The tabulator size. Default is 4.

write(default,method) : s : String -> x : Float -> y : Float -> ?centered : Bool -> ?bounds : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> ?tight : Bool -> de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2

write(default,method) : text : String -> x : Float -> y : Float -> ?centered : Bool -> ?bounds : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> ?tight : Bool -> de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
Draws text to the screen at the position x,y, which is the lower-left corner of the first character.

writeCharSet(default,method) : x : Float -> y : Float -> maxWidth : Float -> de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2

inherited from de.polygonal.gl.text.VectorFont
Draws all supported characters to the screen at the position x,y, which is the lower-left corner of the first character.
